transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ha hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ha. IndiaMART se bol rahe hain?
Customer: Bol raha hu.

Customer: Vikram baat kar raha hu sir Rajasthan se.
Executive: Ha ji ji Vikram sir, Veer sir Abdul bol raha hu sir, ji sir.
Customer: Abdul ji mere bande ka phone aaya tha IndiaMART logout ho gaya kisi ne chedchad kiya hai kya mere account se?

Executive: Kya?
Customer: Mere executive ka phone aaya tha ki sir IndiaMART logout ho gaya. Kisi ne chedchad kiya hai kya mere account mein?

Executive: Ek second rukiye sir line pe rahiye aap.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye sir please kya hua sir?
Executive: Keh raha hu mere executive ka phone aaya tha ki account logout ho rakha hai. Kisi ne chedchad kiya hai kya mere account se?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir kisi ne koi kaise kar sakta hai wo to access aapke paas hota hai na.
Customer: Hum log kaise kar sakte hai koi bhi nahi kar sakta na logout wo to aapke device pe hota hai.
Customer: Mai wahi keh raha hu sir aisa possible to nahi hai chaliye mai karta hu sir check karta hu bolta hu ladke ko check karne.
Executive: Ji ji, theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai Abdul ji kal ho jayega kal mai officially office pahunch jaunga.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Theek hai, okay.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART account logged out.

Resolution:

- Executive confirmed only customer has access.

- Executive will check with his team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check with his team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account, logout, access, executive
